skillTree.name: Carrion Swarms
skillTree.description: Carrion follow this army, eager for fresh food.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: -10% for enemy armies starting their turn in this province
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Ancient Tyrant
skillTree.description: You cannot build an empire without sacrificing a few sons…

skillTree.name: Embalmed in Elixir
skillTree.description: The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.

skillTree.name: Ceremonial Bandages
skillTree.description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Grand Vizier's Command
skillTree.description: All vampiric creatures instinctively obey Arkhan's commands, for he is the agent of their creator.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all vampiric units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +5 for all vampiric units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for all vampiric units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for all vampiric units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Packs of Terror
skillTree.description: The vampiric warbeasts are more vicious and bloodthirsty than the carrion of Nehekhara.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Devourers of Dead Flesh
skillTree.description: Few creatures have a taste for decomposed flesh; even the undead must beware the hunters from the crypt.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Crypt Ghouls and Crypt Horrors units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -10% for Crypt Ghouls and Crypt Horrors units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Spirit Binder
skillTree.description: A necromancer of unparalleled skill, Arkhan binds the wraiths to his will and sets them loose in battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Cairn Wraiths, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: +10% for Cairn Wraiths, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Cairn Wraiths, Hexwraiths and Mortis Engine units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ptra the Great Father
skillTree.description: Symbolising immortality and eternity, the ruler of the Nehekharan Pantheon has always had a care for the wellbeing of his children.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Tomb Guard, Tomb Barque and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Tomb Princes
	(factionwide)

Weapon strength: +10% for Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariots and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +10% for Tomb Barque and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Tomb Guard, Tomb Barque and Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Geheb the God of Earth
skillTree.description: "They stand staring into the sun for eternity, the physical embodiment of the everlasting gods. Terrible ye who looked into their divine forms!"

effects.description:
Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +2 for Ushabti units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Usirian the God of the Underworld
skillTree.description: Those who oppose the faceless God of the Underworld shall suffer terribly, condemned to its lowest levels for eternity.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +25% for Casket of Souls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Asaph the Goddess of Magic & Vengeance
skillTree.description: They who serve the Asp Goddess are blessed with a precise aim with which to reach their objectives.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +15% for Skeleton Archers and Sepulchral Stalkers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Khsar the Faceless
skillTree.description: They who follow the Faceless one will descend upon their foes with the speed of the desert wind.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 when fighting in desert terrain
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +25% when in own or allied territory
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Phakth the God of the Sky & Justice
skillTree.description: It is said that the piercing eyes of Phakth can judge a man's soul in an instant, and know all the sins of his lifetime.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Disciple of Ualatp
skillTree.description: The sacred carrion who serve Ualatp can find much among the lost and abandoned in the desert.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 for Carrion units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Carrion units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Neru the Goddess of the Moon
skillTree.description: Loved and pursued by Ptra, Neru watches over Nehekhara and prevents it from falling into darkness.

effects.description:
Ward save: +8% when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Indomitable Will
skillTree.description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.

skillTree.name: Conqueror
skillTree.description: Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Tombstrike
skillTree.description: He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Over My Dead Body
skillTree.description: Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.

skillTree.name: Desertstrike
skillTree.description: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

skillTree.name: Plunderer of the East
skillTree.description: Mountains will not stand in my way. Now, bring forth exotic treasures worthy of a Nehekharan King.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: +5%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Tribute Collectors
skillTree.description: Nehekhara's wealth will return to the Necropolis.

skillTree.name: Cursed Weapons
skillTree.description: Djaf empowers the weapons of this army, but he demands a sacrifice of gold and blood in return.

skillTree.name: Servants of Ualatep
skillTree.description: A flock of carrion and lost souls travels with this force, greedily picking over the fallen for items of value.

skillTree.name: Poison of Sokth
skillTree.description: None shall escape mighty Rakhash!

skillTree.name: Sacrifices for Ptra
skillTree.description: The blood of our foes shall earn Ptra's blessing.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Passage to the Soul Realm
skillTree.description: The promise of a glorious afterlife worthy of a courageous warrior keeps embattled troops focused on the grim task at hand.

skillTree.name: Arrows of Asaph
skillTree.description: Carrying the blessing of the goddess Asaph, these arrows seek out the foe with unerring accuracy.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Skeleton Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sun-Scorched Bones
skillTree.description: Death isn't necessarily the end; those who have pledged service must rise to fight again another day.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guard, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guard, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Elite Cavalrymen
skillTree.description: Formed by long campaigns and bloody slaughter in the stifling desert heat, the bond between steed and rider cannot be broken, even when death tries to intervene.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Skeleton Horse Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Skeleton Horse Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +20% for Necropolis Knights, Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen and Skeleton Horse Archers
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Master Charioteers
skillTree.description: "The swift charioteers of the king. They who pursue the sovereign's foes on the day of his awakening."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Archers Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Khemrian Warsphinx, Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for Khemrian Warsphinx, Skeleton Archers Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Revered Stonemasonry
skillTree.description: Simple stone is afforded more respect than other materials, for from its grain giant guardians are hewn, brought to shuddering life by the Liche Priests' sorcery.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Hierotitan, Ushabti and Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Ushabti (Great Bow) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Stone Sentinels
skillTree.description: Not even stone is set in stone it seems – arcane death magic is used to bring tortured, savage vigour to once-dormant stone sentinels.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Sepulchral Stalkers, Necrosphinx and Tomb Scorpion units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Reanimate
skillTree.description: It takes an iron will and unnatural - supernatural - strength to rally bound troops routed by magical means.

skillTree.name: Blessing of the Asp
skillTree.description: Arrows loosed under the ever-watchful eye of the Serpent Goddess find their marks with divine precision.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horse Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horse Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Skeleton Archers, Ushabti (Great Bow), Skeleton Horse Archers, Screaming Skull Catapult and Bone Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dune Rider
skillTree.description: The desert itself is his steed.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +5% for Nehekhara Horsemen, Skeleton Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers, Necropolis Knights, Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unfading Memory
skillTree.description: A dream of glory attained through conquest great rages still, despite the dying of the light.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10% for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen and Tomb Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Nehekhara Warriors, Tomb Guards, Skeleton Warriors and Spearmen units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen and Tomb Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Stone
skillTree.description: The very strength of the desert, to stand sentinel over the Tomb Kings' domain and crush their enemies to dust.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Ushabti, Tomb Scorpion, Hierotitan, Necrosphinx and Khemrian Warsphinx units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Resurrect
skillTree.description: Dark litanies are uttered to restore the Tomb Kings' slain soldiers to a twisted, chattering imitation of life.

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Sand Sweeper
skillTree.description: Some of war's spoils are more difficult to see but are just as valuable as gold or jewels.

skillTree.name: Soul Reaper
skillTree.description: This one scours the battlefields, plains and dunes for the vanquished dead, so that his armies may march at full strength once more.

skillTree.name: Canopic Jar Hoarder
skillTree.description: These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

skillTree.name: Attend Me!
skillTree.description: Nehekhara's mummified rulers are awake, their eyes burning with balefire, their thirst for power, conquest and vengeance every bit as strong as they were in life.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Imperishable
skillTree.description: By which the Undead armies of Nehekhara may remain deathless, undying and forever hungry for slaughter.

effects.description:
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -45% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: All is Mine!
skillTree.description: To the victor, the spoils. All of them. Always.

skillTree.name: The Dead Sand Sentinel
skillTree.description: It stands watch over the land, lest the foe's insidious, opportunistic agents dare to strike.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: Renowned among their allies and feared by enemies both mortal and otherwise, this Lord's every deed adds to their already legendary reputation.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local province)

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -1%. Effect is additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Rakhash of the Second Dynasty
backgroundSkills.description: Conquering lands beyond the mountains east of Nehekhara, Rakhash was a bringer of great prosperity.

ui_effects.description: ➕25% chance to deal 5 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➕ Activates automatically when conditions are met

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.name: Khemrian Warsphinx
backgroundSkills.description: Giant leonine statues, almost impervious to harm; they wade through foes, crushing them like bothersome insects.

backgroundSkills.name: Skeletal Steed
backgroundSkills.description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.

backgroundSkills.name: Skeleton Chariot
backgroundSkills.description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
